EmailTemplate.description: Response when an attachment is rejected.
EmailTemplate.name: Case Management Attachment Rejected Default
EmailTemplate.subject: Problem with Attachment, Case Number {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting us. We have received your email and are working on responding to you as soon as possible.
However, one or more of your attachments is not an acceptable file type or exceeds our maximum receipt size. Attachments can be a maximum of 5MB each, or 10MB total per email.
Please reply to this email with your attachment(s). We accept the following attachment types: Microsoft Word (.doc or .docx) Microsoft Excel (.xls or .xlsx) Image (.jpg, .jpeg, .gif, .png) Adobe PDF (.pdf) Text (.txt)
{!Case.Thread_Id}
